thread.title: Factbox: Trump on Twitter (February 7) - Republic of Korea, FBI, Stock Market

title: Factbox: Trump on Twitter (February 7) - Republic of Korea, FBI, Stock Market
text:
The following statements were posted to the verified Twitter accounts of U.S. President Donald Trump, @realDonaldTrump and @POTUS.
The opinions expressed are his own. Reuters has not edited the statements or confirmed their accuracy.
@realDonaldTrump :
- In the “old days,” when good news was reported, the Stock Market would go up. Today, when good news is reported, the Stock Market goes down. Big mistake, and we have so much good (great) news about the economy! [0959 EST]
- NEW FBI TEXTS ARE BOMBSHELLS! [1110 EST] - Best wishes to the Republic of Korea on hosting the @Olympics! What a wonderful opportunity to show everyone that you are a truly GREAT NATION! [1301 EST]
-- Source link: ( bit.ly/2jBh4LU ) ( bit.ly/2jpEXYR )
Compiled by Bengaluru bureau
